item.title: SCOTUS Rejects Bid To Block California’s ‘Racially Gerrymandered’ Congressional Map
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court rejected a Republican-led effort to block California Democrats’ “racially gerrymandered” congressional map on Wednesday. In an ...

item.title: Europeans Testify On How Europe Is Banning Americans From Saying What They Believe
item.description: 'European laws [are] now being exported by the European Union. ... American speech is already being affected.'

item.title: Turns Out The Left Loves Borders — Just Not America’s

item.title: Trump’s Triumphal Arch Is An Important Rebellion Against Postmodern Thought
item.description: The greatness of neoclassical art and architecture lies not merely in historical memory but in truth. And that's why modernists hate it.

item.title: Why Are So Many Nurses Wishing Harm To Their Political Opponents?
item.description: Too many Americans cleave to the idea that if someone works in caregiving, they must be trustworthy.
